product_name: Outdoor Research Helium Hybrid Wind Jacket - Men's
long_description: Built for fast fun from trail running epics to full-on alpine assaults, the men's Outdoor Research Helium Hybrid Jacket is a superlight wind jacket with waterproof fabric on the shoulders and hood. Weighs just 5.7 oz., great for fast-and-light endeavors. Waterproof, breathable Pertex(R) Shield+ fabric on the shoulders and hood; body is stretchy ripstop nylon. Water-resistant front zipper and storm flap help seal out weather, as do critically taped seams. Zip chest pocket doubles as stuff sack. Drawcord hem; elastic cuffs; key clip. Outdoor Research Helium Hybrid Jacket for men has reflective logos for enhanced visibility in dim light.
short_description: Built for fast fun from trail running epics to full-on alpine assaults, the men's Outdoor Research Helium Hybrid Jacket is a superlight wind jacket with waterproof fabric on the shoulders and hood.
